name: PLANETS OF WAR
description: This is a Short Clicking Adventure Game in which you Save Earth from an Alien Invasion.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 @ 2.2GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+ @ 2.8 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: ATI RADEON X1600 / NVIDIA GEFORCE 7600 OR HIGHER DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 500 MB available space
